website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful Pop figure for collectors and a durable toy for those who chose to play with it.
pros: An excellent throwback to Julie Newmar’s Catwoman
Glitter and gold detailing are aesthetically pleasing and give the suit an iridescent glow
Can be used for play, or added to your existing collection of Funko Pops
cons: Some complaints of slight painting defects on the mask

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this, let me first explain the missing star though. There was a little dirt or like black glue between the face and hair, but it is nothing that will make me loose interest. I am not really a funko pop collector, so I do not know the going rate of the ones they most sell in stores, but it came on time, it is so pretty, and I suprisingly like the design more than the modern catwoman. If you like catwoman, I really would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and adorable Cat Woman Funko Pop
customer_reviews.text: Love this 1966's version of Cat Woman, her black suit is coated with purple glitter (blue on picture). Paint is smeared in some areas of Pop figure. Minor detail that could be overlooked. I prefer this version of Cat Woman then "The Dark Knight - Cat Woman". Kudos to Funko for creating a female heroine character, there is not much in DC Comics or Marvel series.
customer_reviews.author: Quin P

customer_reviews.title: very nice collectible. Of note
customer_reviews.text: A rare-retired find, very nice collectible. Of note, for this particular line of figures, the painting of the mask slightly crossed over onto the face of the figure - apparently manufacturing challenge/issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Catwoman on the cheap
customer_reviews.text: if you're looking for a Catwoman and you don't want to pay $35 for the Dark Knight Rises version this is a good alternative, they're not even that much different and I think the box looks better on this one
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Sugarbear

customer_reviews.title: Slight paint problem
customer_reviews.text: Has slight paint problam on mask where one has skin paint on top and other one the mask paint was on her forehead. Other than that is adorable
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wise

customer_reviews.title: Bad paint job
customer_reviews.text: The figure I received had a spot under the mask where the flesh tone paint did not fully cover the underlying black vinyl. Also the glitter on the black catsuit is very uneven. I should have returned/exchanged it but it has been sitting on my Catwoman shelf for too long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the box cover and I am really happy/excited it had it!! I’ve been wanting this Catwoman for awhile and she as at a pretty good price, I couldn’t pass her up.
customer_reviews.author: Alana G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure
customer_reviews.text: Awesome figure!!!!!!!!!! Be advised that ordering Funko Pops online without seeing a photo of the actual figure you'll be getting puts you at risk of receiving a figure with paint flaws like mine. Purple coated black paint for her outfit is pretty cool. Funko Pops are awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MossyOak23

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop but minor paint issues.
customer_reviews.text: I love that they made a Pop of her. The only issue with the Pop was that part of her mask wasn't painted and it looks a little off because of that but other than that it is a great Pop. The paint issue wasn't bad enough to warrant it being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Female Hero
customer_reviews.text: Trying to expand our Funko POP collection to include more female heroines. We viewed both the 1966 classic figure and the new version - the 1966 won hands down. The outfit is more colorful and the figure is adorable. This is a great addition to our Funko collection. Vendor was easy to deal with and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: BluBobcat

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: The new 1966 Batman Retro Series by Funko is off the charts! I grew up with the show and these fun figures bring back great memories. The details are spot on ... this figure features a multi-color glitter mixed in with the black paint ... just like Julie Newmar's original costume. Let's just say ... it's purrrfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. CESARE

customer_reviews.title: Nice pop doll from the Batman show
customer_reviews.text: Nice features on this doll. It actually has glitter in the black paint all over her which is a nice touch. Paint job not the greatest tho at least on mine but that doesnt bother me since I am not a serious collector.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Yet another nice Funko Pop
customer_reviews.text: We have about 20 Funko POPs, and I love them. We got this as a gift for a little girl who likes Cat Woman. I'm pretty sure she doesn't have any Funko's, so I'm excited to see her get this!
customer_reviews.author: Roderic Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Box is severely damaged. There is what appears to be glue on her glasses and paint smudges all over her face. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: perfect! The green sequins outfit is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, well-packed box, perfect! The green sequins outfit is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Garelik

customer_reviews.title: Pop Catwoman
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but the paint job is a little off. Kinda lazy to me but this homage to Julie Newmar's Catwoman is the cats='s meow! Great addition to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna R Von Eps

customer_reviews.title: Great ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I realy love my Funko Pop Catwoman. She is fashionable and matches perfectly with my Batman 1966. I was surprise and happy at how quickly it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Drika Faro

customer_reviews.title: Funko Family
customer_reviews.text: Funko Collector - pictures don't do Cat Woman justice. Her cat suit is an iridescent black with silver speckles. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: CoriLizBeth

customer_reviews.title: 1966 Cat Woman
customer_reviews.text: The figure came a day early which i was really excited about and it came looking fantastic. Nothing was wrong with the figure and it even superceded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: another one to my collection the catsuit is a glittery black and green well done
customer_reviews.author: the hamburglar

customer_reviews.title: Great funko pop
customer_reviews.text: Really nice funko pop. It glows, the complete collection looks wonderfull
customer_reviews.author: David Benzi

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item loved it when it showed up. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Marelorline

customer_reviews.title: great appeal
customer_reviews.text: I liked this character when i saw it.. The detail on it is very clear and alike to what you display in the picture. I gave it as a gift and they liked it alot.
customer_reviews.author: christine chan

customer_reviews.title: Glitter !
customer_reviews.text: A little excessive on the glitter but it's cool . It completes the collection. Funko needs to go on quality control though...:(
customer_reviews.author: Shemhamforash

customer_reviews.title: I love my cat woman pop vinyl
customer_reviews.text: I love my cat woman pop vinyl. I have been a fan of the original Batman series since the 60's and this is the perfect addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: TracyS

customer_reviews.title: Its a good addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: Its a good addition to my collection, but the paint around the eyes were a bit messy, like it could've been a better paint job, but its no big deal
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this figure! My first POP! vinyl. A little wobbly, but easily stabilized.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend's birthday. And it is what was described. Happy to I got this!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: just as described and pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love her. She has glitter on the costume and her mask. It's dark greenish glitter and looks just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: huge batman fan from any era. this is very well done
customer_reviews.author: Lance D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It immediately sends me back to age 10 watching the reruns on TV!
customer_reviews.author: Ludwell Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pop - great addition to our ever expanding collection. The details on these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with any funko pop item. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the glitter was spotted and missing in some spots, she's cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Alison Worriax

customer_reviews.title: Catwoman!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great funko ! One of the better ones I have!
customer_reviews.author: Julia D.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter just loves Cat Woman and she was so ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves Cat Woman and she was so excited to get this. Now she wants the all of the POP Vinyl figures from the Batman series
customer_reviews.author: Linusfan13

customer_reviews.title: #1 Catwoman - Julie Newmar
customer_reviews.text: She's so cute! I love her. Note: her catsuit is black with glittery stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karlenea

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect
customer_reviews.text: she is so awesome, a great add to my collection
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there was some glitter on her forehead and hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My twelve year old daughter asked for this. She collects them.
customer_reviews.author: Assaka115

customer_reviews.title: 66 catwomen the best
customer_reviews.text: I am a big batman 66 fan..love the glitter costume
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Kaznica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Came as described. Would buy from again. Thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Paint was a little messed up, but otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match to my boyfriend's
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find this anywhere locally. Perfect match to my boyfriend's Batman
customer_reviews.author: Customer in NY

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great to have the super heroes for girls! These are good size so they aren't lost easily and are pretty for super type characters
customer_reviews.author: Kate L

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Face mask paint was splotched near eyes and above mask.
customer_reviews.author: MattyP

customer_reviews.title: Love her but hate that she looks like she was in a fight.
customer_reviews.text: The paint was messed up, but this is to be expected of Funko. I still really like my Catwoman, I was just a little disappointed that she came beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wade

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It had a giant sticker on the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Castanon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and beauty product, all Catwoman or Batman fans must have one of this!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Germán Barón

product_meta.title: Funko POP Heroes Cat Woman 1966 Vinyl Figure
product_meta.description:
From the hit wacky 1966 Batman TV Series. This Batman 1966 TV Series Catwoman Pop. Vinyl Figure features Batman's most meowing nemesis, Catwoman (as played by Julie Newmar), rendered in the adorable Pop. Vinyl format.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the hit wacky 1966 Batman TV Series! This Batman 1966 TV Series Catwoman Pop! Vinyl Figure features Batman's most meowing nemesis, Catwoman (as played by Julie Newmar), rendered in the adorable Pop! Vinyl format
